resources.string: By tapping on continue, I accept the use of my personal information for the purpose of optimizing the app experience for me. View the terms of service and our privacy policy
Micka needs to access to your position as well as your phone to make calls when you ask it to. Allow Phone and Location permissions in your phone settings in order to use Micka
Used for sign in and to contact you about a ride.
